name: Sunset Park
address: 2601 E Sunset Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89120
description: Large park offering playgrounds, picnic areas, multi-purpose fields, and walking trails for families.
reviews: Lots of playground equipment for all ages.
Beautiful lake view and picnic areas.

name: Craig Ranch Regional Park
address: 628 W Craig Rd, North Las Vegas, NV 89032
description: Spacious park with multiple playgrounds, sports fields, splash pad, and picnic areas ideal for family outings.
reviews: Plenty of facilities for all ages.
Splash pad is perfect for hot days.
Clean playgrounds and lots of shade.

name: Floyd Lamb Park at Tule Springs
address: 9200 Tule Springs Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89131
description: Historic park featuring lakes, walking trails, picnic areas, and playgrounds, great for family days outdoors.
reviews: Perfect for family picnics and fishing.
Plenty of shade and kid-friendly play areas.

name: Exploration Peak Park
address: 9275 S Buffalo Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89178
description: Park with hiking trails, picnic areas, and a large playground featuring unique equipment for children.
reviews: Wonderful park to hike and explore with kids.
Playground is unique and my kids love the slide.
Plenty of shaded areas and green grass.
Safe, clean, and fun for the whole family.

name: Pioneer Park
address: 530 Las Vegas Blvd N, Las Vegas, NV 89101
description: Urban park with playgrounds, walking paths, and picnic facilities close to downtown Las Vegas.
reviews: Perfect for a short family visit.

name: Child Haven Park
address: 8400 W Robindale Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89143
description: Community park with playgrounds, picnic shelters, and family-friendly open spaces.
reviews: A nice neighborhood park with great facilities.

name: Gilcrease Nature Sanctuary Park
address: 2121 S Valley View Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89102
description: Nature sanctuary with picnic spots, walking trails, and playgrounds suitable for kids and families.
reviews: Playgrounds are well designed and safe.
Great spot for kids to learn about nature.

name: Mountain Crest Park
description: Family-friendly park with sports courts, playgrounds, picnic areas, and walking paths.
reviews: Nice playground and plenty of green space.

name: Siena Park
address: 6309 Siena Vista St, Las Vegas, NV 89139
description: Community park featuring playgrounds, sports courts, walking trails, and picnic areas.

name: Las Vegas Wetlands Park
address: 7050 Wetlands Park Ln, Las Vegas, NV 89122
description: Nature park with walking trails, bird watching, and educational programs suitable for families.
reviews: Great for hiking and wildlife spotting.

name: Sunrise Mountain Regional Park
description: Regional park featuring hiking trails, picnic areas, and playgrounds for family recreation.

name: Whitney Ranch Park
address: 11400 Tom Kimmel Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89141
description: Community park with playgrounds, sports courts, picnic shelters, and walking paths.
reviews: Clean and well cared for park.
Lots of picnic areas for families.
